attributes.action: Introduce set licencing and legislation in place for companys who run limos
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Introduce set licencing and legislation in place for companys who run limo's.
Limo's currently licenced as private hire cars or minibuses as there are no rules/guidlines that fit them exactly which leads to a big grey area as to what you can and can't do when driving them.
I propose that licencing is set for capacity, limited alcohol retail, requirements for drivers and details on what permits are needed for limited access roads.
